comments.body: I see that newTestWatchPlugin() is using this NewTestPlugin() interface. Don't we need to supply volumeAttachmentLister for testing csi-attacher with lister?
Only the `AttachDetachVolumeHost` has a `volumeAttachmentLister`. This test plugin constructor is not used in the CSI attacher test and doesn't use that volume host interface.

Oh I see. Looks like there is quite a bit of code change in this area recently. I was referring to slightly older code.

Isn't AttachDetachVolumeHost using the fakeVolumeHost here? What am I missing?
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/0eea524c28ea4c0e4a0d2746184f3dc63ff124b9/pkg/volume/testing/volume_host.go#L242

It is, and the `fakeVolumeHost` has a field for the `volumeAttachmentLister`.

The reason for this splitting-out of different volume hosts was because previously the `fakeVolumeHost` type implemented both the `AttachDetachVolumeHost` and `KubeletVolumeHost` interfaces, which made it not possible to test behavior differences between the two, because it passes both conditionals here.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/9d8f994d4ec15a5f37381a5d8ec37c6c53f81543/pkg/volume/csi/csi_plugin.go#L193-L216
